bibl.title: The Gaza 'Wine' Jar (Gazition) and the 'Lost' Ashkelon Jar (Askalônion).
bibl.note: The éskal≈nion and the gaz€tion are storage-jars, amphorae, or containers for a variety of products. Archaeological evidence. Inventory of askalônia and gazitia and their contents, from the papyri and ostraca. Identification of the jars. <askalonion, gazition>
MAYERSON Philip, The Gaza 'Wine' Jar (Gazition) and the 'Lost' Ashkelon Jar (Askalônion).
